item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. CVE-2025-31160 Atop 2.11 heap problems (24 points | 9 comments)

8. Spark AI (YC W24) Is Hiring a Full-Stack Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)

28. Making of the New York and Erie Railroad Organizational Diagram (15 points | 2 comments)
29. We hacked Gemini's Python sandbox and leaked its source code (at least some) (622 points | 126 comments)
30. De-Atomization Is the Secret to Happiness (5 points | discuss)
